bibl.title: Storing in the Church: Artefacts in Room I of the Petra Church. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Room I: from a dormitory to destruction by fire. - The papyrus deposits. - Wooden, metal and glass objects. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Objects in Context, Objects in Use. Material Spatiality in Late Antiquity.

bibl.seg: FIEMA Zbigniew T., Storing in the Church: Artefacts in Room I of the Petra Church. Avec résumé en anglais.
Luke LAVAN, Ellen SWIFT and Toon PUTZEYS (Edd.), Objects in Context, Objects in Use. Material Spatiality in Late Antiquity = Late Antique Archaeology. 5 (Leiden - Boston, 2007) pp. 607-623, 3 figg.
Introduction. - Room I: from a dormitory to destruction by fire. - The papyrus deposits. - Wooden, metal and glass objects. - Conclusion.
